rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a wheelchair-accessible ramp and wide doorways. Vastu compliant design ensuring positive energy flow.
Open plan living area with contemporary design, ample natural light, and Vastu aligned orientation for harmony.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen with Vastu recommendations on auspicious placement.
Dedicated workspace designed for optimum productivity and equipped with provisions for wheelchair accessibility as required.
Comfortable space allocated for domestic staff, ensuring privacy and adherence to local building norms.
A guest room designed with contemporary amenities following Vastu guidelines for positive energy.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with threshold adjustments as per norms.
Balcony-style porch integrated with the entrance for added accessibility and style.
Large windows ensuring abundant natural light and Vastu aligned placement.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed for comfort and in accordance with Vastu principles.
A secondary bedroom aligned to ensure positive energy flow and privacy.
Contemporary bathroom design ensuring ease of movement for wheelchair accessibility where necessary.

openings.description: Balcony with panoramic views and Vastu compliant orientation.
